attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has assumed office without facing a General Election. We the undersigned feel that the Prim Minister should immediately call a General Election to provide the people of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland an opportunity to chose between his programme of reform and the programme offered by others.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
